title: Project 1  Title: Using Large Learning Models to improve service delivery, Project 2  Title: Using Large Learning Models to improve service delivery
description:
Project 1

Title: Using Large Learning Models to improve service delivery

Description: Governments deliver many services to the citizens – property registration, tax collection, health, education to name a few. The moment of truth for this happens when the citizen interacts with a front line worker (FLW) – be it a nurse, teacher or sub-registrar. Governments have myriad of rules which make the job  of the FLW very difficult – she needs to be sure that the correct and the latest rules are applied for a particular situation. 


This project aims to implement a LLM solution which will provide an interactive mechanism which will support the FLW in retrieving the correct rules. Additionally, we aim to also have both the instructions and the outputs to be enabled by voice so that the whole transaction can happen over a feature phone.


As an extension, we will look at extending this as a customer self service.


Skill sets: Machine Learning, Open Source DPI (like Bhashini), Sunbird, Algorithms

Traits expectation: Curiosity, Never-say-die, Public spirited, Patience, Empathy

Expected learning: Tech in Governance, DPI/DPG

Specific courses required for project execution:  Algorithms & Data structures, Machine Learning

This project aims to implement a LLM solution which will provide an interactive mechanism which will support the FLW in retrieving the correct rules.
